summary: With this simple mod you can upgrade top Nightingale Blade with 25 absorb points of health/stamina.
descriptionHtml:
THIS FIX WAS IMPLEMENTED IN [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url]!

I saw many people complaining they can\'t upgrade Nightingale Blade they get on 46+ levels. With this simple fix now you can upgrade this Nightingale Blade with 25 absorb points of health/stamina.

Installation is very simple. Drop this esp to your data folder, check it in your launcher and enjoy.
author: mluppov
